Articles.Content:
Recreation of New Horizons mission in Real Solar System. New Horizons was the first spacecraft targeted on Pluto, the last unvisited body of the nine original planets known at the beginning of the space age.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/d7w19_hgbRM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Pictures, details: 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/fNMv2)

\*\*\*

I'm planning to make regular youtube video series with recreations of real missions, alternative history and some fictional ideas in RSS & RO.

My next plans: 

Voyager 2 (september) 

Manned Venus Flyby (october)

\*\*\*

Credits, music at the end of video.
WOW! That was amazing! You deserve my rep!
